languages.text: "Еретик, ксенос и мутант — все они равно противны свету. Все они есть отрава, и надлежит ее выжечь очистительным огнем!"
"The heretic, the xenos, and the mutant — they are all equally repulsive to the light. They are all poison that must be burned away with purifying flame!"
languages.original_text: "Еретик, ксенос и мутант — все они равно противны свету. Все они есть отрава, и надлежит ее выжечь очистительным огнем!"

traits.locale_text: "The heretic, the xenos, and the mutant — they are all equally repulsive to the light. They are all poison that must be burned away with purifying flame!"
"The heretic, the xenos, and the mutant — they are all equally repulsive to the light. They are all poison that must be burned away with purifying flame!"
"The heretic, the xenos, and the mutant — they are all equally repulsive to the light. They are all poison that must be burned away with purifying flame!"
"The heretic, the xenos, and the mutant — they are all equally repulsive to the light. They are all poison that must be burned away with purifying flame!"
"The heretic, the xenos, and the mutant — they are all equally repulsive to the light. They are all poison that must be burned away with purifying flame!"

languages.text: “异端分子、异形与变种人，他们都是光明的敌人，都是有毒的东西，必须用净化的烈焰烧掉才行！”
languages.original_text: "The heretic, the xenos, and the mutant — they are all equally repulsive to the light. They are all poison that must be burned away with purifying flame!"

traits.locale_text: “异端分子、异形与变种人，他们都是光明的敌人，都是有毒的东西，必须用净化的烈焰烧掉才行！”

languages.text: «Los herejes, los xenos y los mutantes: ante la luz, todos son repulsivos a partes iguales. ¡Son un veneno que hay que purificar con fuego!».
languages.original_text: "The heretic, the xenos, and the mutant — they are all equally repulsive to the light. They are all poison that must be burned away with purifying flame!"

traits.locale_text: «Los herejes, los xenos y los mutantes: ante la luz, todos son repulsivos a partes iguales. ¡Son un veneno que hay que purificar con fuego!».

languages.text: 「異端者も、異種族も、変異体も、すべて光に等しく反発するものです。すべて毒であり、浄化の炎で焼き払わなければなりません！」
languages.original_text: "The heretic, the xenos, and the mutant — they are all equally repulsive to the light. They are all poison that must be burned away with purifying flame!"

traits.locale_text: 「異端者も、異種族も、変異体も、すべて光に等しく反発するものです。すべて毒であり、浄化の炎で焼き払わなければなりません！」

languages.text: "Ketzer, Xenos und Mutanten – sie alle scheuen gleichermaßen das Licht. Sie alle sind Gift, das mit reinigenden Flammen verbrannt werden muss!"
languages.original_text: "The heretic, the xenos, and the mutant — they are all equally repulsive to the light. They are all poison that must be burned away with purifying flame!"

traits.locale_text: "Ketzer, Xenos und Mutanten – sie alle scheuen gleichermaßen das Licht. Sie alle sind Gift, das mit reinigenden Flammen verbrannt werden muss!"

languages.text: « Les hérétiques, les xénos et les mutants... Ils sont tous aussi hideux les uns que les autres face à la lumière. Ils sont le poison que nous devons purifier par les flammes ! »
languages.original_text: "The heretic, the xenos, and the mutant — they are all equally repulsive to the light. They are all poison that must be burned away with purifying flame!"

traits.locale_text: « Les hérétiques, les xénos et les mutants... Ils sont tous aussi hideux les uns que les autres face à la lumière. Ils sont le poison que nous devons purifier par les flammes ! »

languages.text: "Kâfirler, zenolar ve mutantlar. Hepsi de ışığın eşit derecede düşmanıdır. Arındırıcı alevlerle yakılması gereken birer zehirdirler!"
languages.original_text: "The heretic, the xenos, and the mutant — they are all equally repulsive to the light. They are all poison that must be burned away with purifying flame!"

traits.locale_text: "Kâfirler, zenolar ve mutantlar. Hepsi de ışığın eşit derecede düşmanıdırlar. Arındırıcı alevlerle yakılması gereken birer zehirdirler!"
